TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because this is the same phenomenon that has happened in countless infinite and parallel universes.

XD He has two 0th posts right now!

Why are my friends so loud?

Edited March 21, 2014 by Maximus97

Because they saw The Kraken.

Why does time have to pass so quackly quickly?

Edited March 21, 2014 by mythbusters844
Quack quack

Because you're secretly a duck and therefore lead a shorter life. Don't think I didn't notice that cheeky little quack there...

Why do so few people realise that posting in the Forum Games section doesn't add to your post count?

Because the people of today have mental barriers to keep them insulated from the hardships of the real worlds.

Why do some people hate flying in airplanes?

Because they live in constant fear that Jeb managed to get his commercial pilots licence and would try to show them space.

Why did Elvis leave the building?

To catch the train, wouldn't want to be late.

Save changes to untitled?

No.

How does one hack into a helicopter?

Preferably with an axe. Unless you have some really heavy swords at hand, in which case, go for it.

Why do duck-shaped objects generally emit duck-like sounds?

The horse took all the good sounds.

How much does an apostrophe weigh?

(-(comma)) newtons

Why can't I look at the Sun?

Because it's very self-conscious and feels awkward when people look at it.

Why don't we just get the sun to therapy?

because it is poor

Can I eat?

No, that would be a harm to the local environment. Try photosynthesising.

Why is it not that easy being green?

Because it is easier to be yellow.

What is Delta-V?

A V in the form of a two dimensional quadrilateral that has three acute angles and one obtuse angle. The easiest way to think of it is the shape of the ship in Space Invaders.

Did you know?

No, I did not know. I knew...

How to forget to fall?

Remember how to fly.

How do I remember how to fly?

Jump and flap your arms.

How do I move my toes?

Forget how to fall.

How about that, ladies and gentlemen?

It tasted like battery juice and dog poop.

Will the government print me a bajillion dollars if I ask nicely?

Yes. too bad a bajillion means 2....

Would anyone like to donate a mol of dollars to me?

Nope.

Who's there?

Chicken Pear.

When does ARM come out?

Last year.

How do I universe.

You don't universe, universe does you! (Don't take that the wrong way)

Do pie pei pie?
